meanings.definition: Relating to or written in wedge-shaped characters used in ancient writing systems.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered a tablet with cuneiform inscriptions.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient artifacts with cuneiform writing.
meanings.sent3: The cuneiform symbols on the tablet seemed to tell a story of ancient kings.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so messy, it looked like cuneiform to me.
meanings.sent5: The cuneiform characters etched on the stone were intricate and fascinating.

meanings.definition: A system of writing using wedge-shaped characters.
meanings.sent1: The scholar studied the history of cuneiform writing.
meanings.sent2: In ancient Mesopotamia, scribes used cuneiform to record transactions.
meanings.sent3: The teacher challenged the students to decipher the cuneiform script.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a tablet filled with cuneiform symbols of memories.
meanings.sent5: The library contained many clay tablets inscribed with cuneiform texts.
